entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
